title: Belarus Looks to Ban Peer-to-Peer Crypto Transactions to Reduce Fraud
description: The east European country is working on legislation to make it harder for fraudsters to get their hands on the proceeds of crime.

title: Navigating the Bitcoin surge: A deep dive into Implied Volatility
description:
Quick Take Glassnode describes “Implied Volatility” as the market’s forecast of price fluctuations. When we know the cost of an option, we can calculate the anticipated volatility of the asset it represents. To put it formally, implied volatility (IV) represents the expected range of an asset’s price movement over a year, within one standard deviation. […]

The post Navigating the Bitcoin surge: A deep dive into Implied Volatility appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BINANCE COIN PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (July 2) – BNB Continues to Consolidate But Bulls Are Showing Interest, Gains 4% Weekly
description: BNB remained in the middle of consolidation since the price crashed in June. It showed strength this week and now approaching a key resistance level with a 10% gain in five days. title: Singapore to mandate crypto exchanges store client funds in a trust
description: Singaporean authorities have drafted plans to make it mandatory for crypto exchanges to store their customers' funds in a trust. The legislation will take effect before the end of the year.
